groundhogR 1.0.0

Get active packages

Source: R/get.active.R
get.active.Rd

Get currently active (=loaded) packages in the session, with their version

get.active()

Value

a data.frame with two columns:

pkg

the package name

pkg_vrs

the package name and its version, separated by an underscore

Examples

# \donttest{
groundhogR:::get.active()
#>           pkg            pkg_vrs
#> 1  rstudioapi    rstudioapi_0.11
#> 2     whisker        whisker_0.4
#> 3        xml2         xml2_1.3.2
#> 4       knitr         knitr_1.29
#> 5    rematch2     rematch2_2.1.2
#> 6    magrittr       magrittr_1.5
#> 7     downlit downlit_0.0.0.9000
#> 8          R6           R6_2.4.1
#> 9       rlang        rlang_0.4.7
#> 10      fansi        fansi_0.4.1
#> 11       httr         httr_1.4.2
#> 12       xfun          xfun_0.15
#> 13        cli          cli_2.0.2
#> 14      withr        withr_2.2.0
#> 15  htmltools    htmltools_0.5.0
#> 16   ellipsis     ellipsis_0.3.1
#> 17       yaml         yaml_2.2.1
#> 18 assertthat   assertthat_0.2.1
#> 19     digest      digest_0.6.25
#> 20  rprojroot    rprojroot_1.3-2
#> 21     tibble       tibble_3.0.3
#> 22  lifecycle    lifecycle_0.2.0
#> 23    pkgdown pkgdown_1.5.1.9000
#> 24     crayon       crayon_1.3.4
#> 25   processx     processx_3.4.3
#> 26      purrr        purrr_0.3.4
#> 27      vctrs        vctrs_0.3.2
#> 28         fs           fs_1.4.2
#> 29         ps           ps_1.3.3
#> 30       curl           curl_4.3
#> 31   evaluate      evaluate_0.14
#> 32    memoise      memoise_1.1.0
#> 33       glue         glue_1.4.1
#> 34  rmarkdown      rmarkdown_2.3
#> 35     pillar       pillar_1.4.6
#> 36       desc         desc_1.2.0
#> 37  backports    backports_1.1.8
#> 38  pkgconfig    pkgconfig_2.0.3
#> 39 groundhogR   groundhogR_1.0.0
# }
